item.title: Venezuelans vote in election challenging Maduro's grip on power
item.description: The opposition is hopeful it can oust the incumbent, whose party has ruled the country for 25 years.

item.title: Harris camp responds to Trump telling Christians they 'don't have to vote again' if he gets elected - ABC News
item.description: Harris camp responds to Trump telling Christians they 'don't have to vote again' if he gets elected  ABC NewsView Full Coverage on Google News

item.title: F-16 fighter jets arrive in Ukraine but may not tip advantage against Russia
item.description: Ukrainian and Western officials now caution that the aircraft once championed by Kyiv as a game changer are unlikely to make an immediate impact on the battlefield.

item.title: IDF announces strikes deep in Lebanon after Golan Heights attack
item.description: Israel’s actions were in retaliation for a rocket strike from Lebanon that killed 12 in the Druze town of Majdal Shams. Hezbollah has denied responsibility.

item.title: Australia news live: Albanese’s cabinet reshuffle sees Giles and O’Neil dumped and Burke taking home affairs
item.description:
Malarndirri McCarthy appointed new Indigenous Australians minister amid raft of other changes. Follow the day’s news live

  • Get our morning and afternoon news emails, free app or daily news podcast

Turning to US politics, Greber says:

It’s a massive shift. You can see it in the way the Democrats feel the momentum.

One of my old sources, I used to be a correspondent in DC, one of my old sources it was as if a month ago the doctor walked in and said, “I’m sorry the test results are terrible, you got three months to live.”

They don’t have many options other than hitting people with mortgages to reduce demand in the economy, which by the way has been driven by an awful lot of federal and state government spending.

The RBA needs to get on top of this and unfortunately people who have mortgages will be the ones who are hit hardest.

Continue reading...

item.title: Eighty nations strike deal over e-commerce, but lack US backing
North Carolina regulators say nonprofit run by lieutenant governor's wife owes the state $132K
India and China agree to work urgently to achieve the withdrawal of troops on their disputed border
